languages.text: "Я — не Аспис!" {n}Лицо Инцендии искажает непроизвольная судорога.{/n} "Закон един для всех! Все подсудны, и нет неприкосновенных меж нами! Иеронимус Скорбный, ты приговорен к смерти!"

traits.locale_text: "Я — не Аспис!" {n}Громогласно вскричав, Инцендия выхватывает оружие и стреляет в грудь своему исповеднику. Ее лицо искажает непроизвольная судорога.{/n} "Закон един для всех! Все подсудны, и нет неприкосновенных меж нами! Иеронимус Скорбный, ты приговорен к смерти!"

languages.text: "I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried, and none among us is immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are hereby sentenced to death!"
languages.original_text: "Я — не Аспис!" {n}Лицо Инцендии искажает непроизвольная судорога.{/n} "Закон един для всех! Все подсудны, и нет неприкосновенных меж нами! Иеронимус Скорбный, ты приговорен к смерти!"

traits.locale_text: "I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried and none among us are immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are sentenced to death!"

"I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried and none among us are immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are sentenced to death!"

"I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried, and none among us are immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are sentenced to death!"

"I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried, and none among us is immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are hereby sentenced to death!"

"I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried, and none among us is immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are hereby sentenced to death!"

languages.text: “我才不是阿斯拜丝！”{n}因森蒂娅的脸无法控制地痉挛起来。{/n}“法律面前，众人平等！无论是谁，都有可能会成为审判的对象！我们之中没有任何人可以幸免！希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索，我在此判处你死刑！”
languages.original_text: "I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried, and none among us is immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are hereby sentenced to death!"

traits.locale_text: “我才不是阿斯拜丝！”{n}因森蒂娅的脸无法控制地痉挛起来。{/n}“法律面前，众人平等！无论是谁，都有可能会成为审判的对象！我们之中没有任何人可以幸免！希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索，我在此判处你死刑！”

languages.text: 「私はアスパイスではない！」{n}インセンディアは抑えきれない痙攣で顔をゆがめた。{/n}「法は全員に平等だ！誰もが裁かれる可能性があり、誰一人として免責される者はいない！ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ、これにてお前を死刑にする！」
languages.original_text: "I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried, and none among us is immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are hereby sentenced to death!"

traits.locale_text: 「私はアスパイスではない！」{n}インセンディアは抑えきれない痙攣で顔をゆがめた。{/n}「法は全員に平等だ！誰もが裁かれる可能性があり、誰一人として免責される者はいない！ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ、これにてお前を死刑にする！」

languages.text: «¡No soy Aspyce!». {n}Un calambre incontrolable retuerce el rostro de Incendia.{/n} «¡La ley es igual para todos! ¡Cualquiera puede ser juzgado y ninguno de nosotros es inmune! ¡Hieronymus Doloroso, queda usted sentenciado a muerte!».
languages.original_text: "I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried, and none among us is immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are hereby sentenced to death!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No soy Aspyce!». {n}Un calambre incontrolable retuerce el rostro de Incendia.{/n} «¡La ley es igual para todos! ¡Cualquiera puede ser juzgado y ninguno de nosotros es inmune! ¡Hieronymus Doloroso, es usted sentenciado a muerte!».

languages.text: "Ich bin nicht Aspyce!" {n}Ein unkontrollierbarer Krampf verzerrt Incendias Gesicht.{/n} "Das Gesetz ist für alle gleich! Jedem kann der Prozess gemacht werden, und niemand ist immun! Hieronymus Doloroso, Ihr werdet hiermit zum Tode verurteilt!"
languages.original_text: "I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried, and none among us is immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are hereby sentenced to death!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nicht Aspyce!" {n}Ein unkontrollierbarer Krampf verzerrt Incendias Gesicht.{/n} "Das Gesetz ist für alle gleich! Jedem kann der Prozess gemacht werden, und niemand ist immun! Hieronymus Doloroso, Ihr werdet zum Tode verurteilt!"

languages.text: {n}Une crampe déforme le visage d'Incendia lorsqu'elle s'exclame :{/n} « Je ne suis pas Aspyce ! La loi est la même pour tous ! Tout le monde peut être jugé et nul n'échappe à la règle ! Hiéronymus Doloroso, je vous condamne à mort ! »
languages.original_text: "I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried, and none among us is immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are hereby sentenced to death!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une crampe déforme le visage d'Incendia lorsqu'elle s'exclame :{/n} « Je ne suis pas Aspyce ! La loi est la même pour tous ! Tout le monde peut être jugé et nul n'échappe à la règle ! Hiéronymus Doloroso, je vous condamne à mort ! »

languages.text: "Ben Aspyce değilim!" {n}İncendia'nın yüzü, kontrolsüz bir krampla çarpılıyor.{/n} "Kanunlar herkes için eşittir! Herkes mahkemede yargılanabilir ve hiçbirimiz dokunulmaz değiliz! Hieronymus Doloroso, an itibarıyla ölüme mahkûm edilmiş bulunuyorsun!"
languages.original_text: "I am not Aspyce!" {n}An uncontrollable cramp twists Incendia's face.{/n} "The law is the same for all! Anyone can be tried, and none among us is immune! Hieronymus Doloroso, you are hereby sentenced to death!"

traits.locale_text: "Ben Aspyce değilim!" {n}İncendia'nın yüzü kontrolsüz bir kramp nedeniyle çarpılıyor.{/n} "Kanunlar herkes için eşittir! Herkes mahkemede yargılanabilir ve hiçbirimiz dokunulmaz değiliz! Hieronymus Doloroso, an itibariyle ölüme mahkûm edilmiş durumdasın!"
